review: Bang for your buck! There are so many things you can do with this, from watching YouTube videos, to Netflix, to games. However, the range of applications is not entirely clear unless you do your research on the device. For the devices that communicate with the Chromecast, it would be great if apps were developed to provide as a Chromecast app launcher. What better way way to show what it can do, than to show to the average user a launchpad to use all of the applications.
